title: Could a Swim Expert Keep Visma-Lease a Bike at the Top of the Tour de France?
content:
Rumors that an Olympic swim coach will succeed outgoing mastermind DS Merijn Zeeman point to growing cross-sport expertise at the top of pro cycling.

Read the full article at Could a Swim Expert Keep Visma-Lease a Bike at the Top of the Tour de France? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
